root.name: Miner Wars 2081
root.description: OverviewMiner Wars centers around the competition over minerals in the asteroid belt of our solar system. Earth's resources have been stripped and humanity has turned to the asteroids of our solar system for minerals. Game play centers on the competition for these resources as the player controls their mining ship and competes against other players fore more resources and try to solve the mystery of the alien artifacts. Competitive missions will include rescue, exploration, revenge, base defense, theft, transportation, stealth, search and destroy, pure harvesting, racing or just flying around and destroying everything you see.
